questions.question: What does AI stand for?
questions.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence.

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of AI?
questions.explanation: There are several types of AI including Narrow, General, and Superintelligent AI.

questions.question: Who is considered the father of AI?
questions.explanation: John McCarthy coined the term 'Artificial Intelligence' and is considered its father.

questions.question: Which of these is a common application of AI?
questions.explanation: AI is widely used in self-driving cars, spam filters, voice assistants, and more.

questions.question: Which branch of AI deals with learning from data?
questions.explanation: Machine Learning is the branch of AI that focuses on learning patterns from data.

questions.question: What is a prompt in AI?
questions.explanation: A prompt is a user input given to an AI model to generate output.

questions.question: Why is prompt clarity important?
options: It improves the relevance of AI output
It makes the AI run faster
questions.explanation: Clear prompts help the AI understand the user request and produce accurate responses.

questions.question: Which prompt style is best for detailed answers?
questions.explanation: Open-ended prompts encourage AI to generate detailed and informative responses.

questions.question: What does prompt engineering aim to improve?
questions.explanation: Prompt engineering improves AI accuracy, relevance, and overall user experience.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT part of prompt engineering?
options: Training the AI model from scratch
questions.explanation: Prompt engineering focuses on crafting input prompts and formatting output, not training models from scratch.

title: Workflow Automation
description: Test your knowledge on automating tasks with AI.

questions.question: Which tool is used for automating workflows?
questions.explanation: Zapier is a tool for automating workflows.

questions.question: What is workflow automation primarily used for?
questions.explanation: Workflow automation reduces manual work, increases efficiency, and minimizes errors.

questions.question: Which type of AI can help automate email responses?
questions.explanation: NLP enables AI to understand and generate human-like text for automated responses.

questions.question: What is a common trigger in workflow automation?
questions.explanation: Triggers like email received, form submission, or scheduled times can start automated workflows.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a workflow automation tool?
questions.explanation: Photoshop is a design tool, not a workflow automation platform.

questions.question: What is AI?
questions.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence.

questions.question: Which AI branch deals with language?
questions.explanation: Natural Language Processing deals with AI understanding and generating language.

questions.question: Which AI branch focuses on images?
questions.explanation: Computer Vision enables AI to interpret and process images and videos.

questions.question: Which AI branch teaches machines to perform tasks by example?
questions.explanation: Machine Learning teaches AI to perform tasks by learning from examples.

questions.question: Which of these is an example of AI application?
questions.explanation: AI is applied in chatbots, recommendation engines, self-driving cars, and more.
